name: VAR_FUSED
description: The VAR_FUSED table contains information about genes fused in the variant.

columns.name: VARIANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the variant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FUSED_GENES
columns.description: List of genes comprising a fusion.
